item.title: In the second quarter of 2014, China's RTB ad spending increased by 616% compared to the previous quarter
item.description: Smaato, a company specializing in mobile real-time bidding (RTB) ad exchange (SMX) and supply side platform (SSP), has reported significant growth in mobile RTB in its Q2 2014 Global Mobile RTB Insights Report. Source: The Smaato RTB Insights Report for Q2 2014. RTB spending in the APAC region for the top five countries. Smaato’s findings show a 69% increase in RTB spending in the second quarter of 2014 compared to the first quarter.
